message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $140. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value.

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I still think the product is worth a bit more. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $155. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with it.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $130. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

I understand you're trying to save some more money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $130. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering $142. It's a fair price, and I think it's the best you'll get.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $125. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
